mapper.select: SELECT ai.ITEM_INDEX, ai.ITEM_NAME, ai.ITEM_DESC, aic.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, aph.PAYMENT_DATE, uai.ITEM_USAGE_STATUS FROM USER_INFO_TB ui JOIN AVATAR_PAYMENT_HISTORY_TB aph ON ui.USER_INDEX = aph.USER_INDEX JOIN AVATAR_ITEM_TB ai ON aph.ITEM_INDEX = ai.ITEM_INDEX JOIN AVATAR_ITEM_CATEGORY_TB aic ON ai.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID = aic.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN USER_AVATAR_INVENTORY_TB uai ON ui.USER_INDEX = uai.USER_INDEX AND ai.ITEM_INDEX = uai.ITEM_INDEX WHERE ui.USER_ID = #{userId};

SELECT ai.ITEM_INDEX, ai.ITEM_NAME, ai.ITEM_DESC, aic.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, aph.PAYMENT_DATE, uai.ITEM_USAGE_STATUS FROM USER_INFO_TB ui JOIN AVATAR_PAYMENT_HISTORY_TB aph ON ui.USER_INDEX = aph.USER_INDEX JOIN AVATAR_ITEM_TB ai ON aph.ITEM_INDEX = ai.ITEM_INDEX JOIN AVATAR_ITEM_CATEGORY_TB aic ON ai.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID = aic.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN USER_AVATAR_INVENTORY_TB uai ON ui.USER_INDEX = uai.USER_INDEX AND ai.ITEM_INDEX = uai.ITEM_INDEX WHERE ui.USER_ID = #{userId} AND aic.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME = #{itemCategoryName};
SELECT ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME FROM AVATAR_ITEM_CATEGORY_TB ORDER BY ITEM_CATEGORY_ID ASC;

SELECT ai.ITEM_INDEX, ai.ITEM_NAME, ai.ITEM_DESC, aic.ITEM_CATEGORY_NAME, aph.PAYMENT_DATE, uai.ITEM_USAGE_STATUS FROM USER_INFO_TB ui JOIN AVATAR_PAYMENT_HISTORY_TB aph ON ui.USER_INDEX = aph.USER_INDEX JOIN AVATAR_ITEM_TB ai ON aph.ITEM_INDEX = ai.ITEM_INDEX JOIN AVATAR_ITEM_CATEGORY_TB aic ON ai.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID = aic.ITEM_CATEGORY_ID LEFT JOIN USER_AVATAR_INVENTORY_TB uai ON ui.USER_INDEX = uai.USER_INDEX AND ai.ITEM_INDEX = uai.ITEM_INDEX WHERE ai.ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue} , '%');
